title: Argonne's Big Data Camp Goes Virtual
description: For five days last July, fourteen high school students attended a virtual coding camp sponsored by Argonne National Laboratoryâ€™s Educational Programs and Outreach and the Argonne Leadership Computing Facility (ALCF), co-taught by laboratory scientists and informal learning educators, and focused on learning techniques for probing and analyzing massive scientific datasets.
